title: Assistive Products for Personal Care and Safety
body: Provision of products designed to maximise an individuals care and personal safety, such as beds and pressure mattresses, bathroom equipment, continence needs and specialised clothing.

title: Personal Mobility Equipment
body: Providing disability support to people of all ages and abilities. We provide a range of products to help people with physical disabilities and impairments to improve their quality of life. Provision of products that enable people physical mobility, such as wheelchairs, transfer aids and walking equipment.

title: Assistance with Life Stage Transitions and Support
body: Including mentoring, peer support, individual skill development, and decision making to support people to make transitions on their terms and in a way that meets their goals and aspirations

title: Assistance with Daily Personal Activities
body: To enable people to live as autonomously as possible – such as personal hygiene, dressing, medication assistance, financial management, communication skills and lifestyle mentoring.

title: Assistance with Travel and Transport
body: Provision of travel arrangements and support for people to access essential services.

title: Assistive Equipment for Recreation
body: Provision products that assist people when engaging in recreational pursuits (e.g., sport, exercise/fitness).

title: Vision Equipment
body: Products designed to assist people to navigate and maintain physical orientation, such as magnifiers, note-taking equipment, braille and guide dogs.

title: Assistance with Daily Tasks in a Group or Shared Living
body: Arrangements to assist individuals with or to supervise tasks of daily living in a shared living environment, which is either temporary or ongoing and designed to develop the skills of the individual to live as autonomously as possible.

title: Innovative Community Participation
body: Where individuals are supported to participate in mainstream community-based activities that are open to all members of the community.

title: Development of Daily Living and Life Skills
body: Including developmental-focused activities and training to enhance the person/’s ability to live as independent an everyday life as possible.

title: Assistance with Household Tasks
body: Such as meal preparation and delivery, house or yard maintenance, cleaning and laundry

title: Hearing Equipment
body: Provision of assistive listening devices (excluding hearing aids).

title: Assistive Products for Household Tasks
body: Provision of products that assist people with domestic tasks in the home, such as cooking, cleaning, washing and general maintenance.

title: Communication and Information Equipment
body: Provision of products to assist people in accessing written or spoken communication through electronic means, as well as to access alternative forms of communication.

title: Participation in the Community
body: Including supported shopping, medical appointments, sporting and recreational events, social activities, visiting or making new friends, travel and transport and building confidence and social skills.

title: Group and Centre-based Activities
body: Such as social outings and group and social activities on Zaer Support Services’s premises.
